Name: azure_availability_average;azure_availability_count;azure_availability_maximum;azure_availability_minimum;azure_availability_total
Description: The percentage of availability for the storage service or the specified API operation. Availability is calculated by taking the TotalBillableRequests value and dividing it by the number of applicable requests, including those that produced unexpected errors. All unexpected errors result in reduced availability for the storage service or the specified API operation.

Name: azure_egress_average;azure_egress_count;azure_egress_maximum;azure_egress_minimum;azure_egress_total
Description: The amount of egress data, in bytes. This number includes egress from an external client into Azure Storage as well as egress within Azure. As a result, this number does not reflect billable egress.

Name: azure_ingress_average;azure_ingress_count;azure_ingress_maximum;azure_ingress_minimum;azure_ingress_total
Description: The amount of ingress data, in bytes. This number includes ingress from an external client into Azure Storage as well as ingress within Azure.

Name: azure_successe2elatency_average;azure_successe2elatency_count;azure_successe2elatency_maximum;azure_successe2elatency_minimum;azure_successe2elatency_total
Description: The end-to-end latency of successful requests made to a storage service or the specified API operation, in milliseconds. This value includes the required processing time within Azure Storage to read the request, send the response, and receive acknowledgment of the response.

Name: azure_successserverlatency_average;azure_successserverlatency_count;azure_successserverlatency_maximum;azure_successserverlatency_minimum;azure_successserverlatency_total
Description: The latency used by Azure Storage to process a successful request, in milliseconds. This value does not include the network latency specified in SuccessE2ELatency.

Name: azure_tablecapacity_average;azure_tablecapacity_count;azure_tablecapacity_maximum;azure_tablecapacity_minimum;azure_tablecapacity_total
Description: The amount of storage used by the storage account's Table service in bytes.

Name: azure_tablecount_average;azure_tablecount_count;azure_tablecount_maximum;azure_tablecount_minimum;azure_tablecount_total
Description: The number of table in the storage account's Table service.

Name: azure_tableentitycount_average;azure_tableentitycount_count;azure_tableentitycount_maximum;azure_tableentitycount_minimum;azure_tableentitycount_total
Description: The number of table entities in the storage account's Table service.

Name: azure_transactions_average;azure_transactions_count;azure_transactions_maximum;azure_transactions_minimum;azure_transactions_total
Description: The number of requests made to a storage service or the specified API operation. This number includes successful and failed requests, as well as requests which produced errors. Use ResponseType dimension for the number of different type of response.
